SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.platformer.escape_beyond.controller

Class GameOverController

java.lang.Object
com.platformer.escape_beyond.controller.GameOverController
public class GameOverController extends Object
The controller class for the Game Over screen of the game. It handles user interactions after the game fails, allowing the player to restart the game or return to the main menu.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the Game Over screen. Sets the background image, adjusts its size, and applies visual effects such as opacity.

    • MouseClicked_Restart

      public void MouseClicked_Restart(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the user clicks the Restart button. Resets the game state and restarts the game.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the Restart button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while restarting the game.

    • ExitButtonAction

      public void ExitButtonAction(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the user clicks the Exit button. Returns the user to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the Exit button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while navigating to the main menu.
